A regular speaker at tea parties, Mike Pence is one of a small number of elected Republicans with an appeal to economic, social and national security conservatives," he writes. Last fall, the presidential talk got a boost when he won the straw poll at the Value Voters' summit, surprising many who assumed that Mike Huckabee had it in the bag. Philip Klein believes Mike Pence may see 2012 as a better opportunity to run for president than a future date.
